page.title: 09THE GARAGE,BUCKHORN WESTON
page.content: Mr. Cross was interviewed by Sharon and she asked him how long the garage had been in his family he said his granfather had started it 70 years ago hes father had it before him and he hoped his son would carry it on. He employs a couple of mechanics and does repairs as well as selling petrol. He has a breakdown truck and will go out to bring back brocken vehicles He also has a car hire service. he has two children who attend local schools and he considers he makes a good living from his busiuess and likes living in Buckhorn Weston very much.
